about_the_game:
In MONKEE GAME you each play as a colourful monkee. The aim is to parkour and climb upwards as the screen ascends. DON'T fall off the screen, or you'll lose a life! Play locally or online with friends in this competitive, randomly generated climber.

Features


  • Up to 8 players in a game!
  • Local, Lan and Online Multiplayer
  • Randomly generated levels makes each game new and exciting!
  • PVP mode where you try to knock your opponents off screen and outclimb them to be the last monkee standing
  • CO-OP mode where all monkees work and climb together to escape the moving screen
  • Singleplayer mode to practice your climbing abilities and set high scores
  • A range of funky items such as boomerangs and jetpacks!
  • Controller compatible!
  • Many differents colours to choose from to make your monkee unique
  • High, Medium, and Low difficulty course modes for new players to advanced climbers

name: MONKEE GAME

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: CPU: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: MONKEE GAME is an endless climber party game. Play with up to 8 players co-op or pvp and try and stay on the screen. Grab and use items to either hinder or help your friends as you all scale upwards!
